response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value and relevance to you at $15,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $14,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-value item at a discounted rate. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and align with your budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
